amendatorysection.para: The Licensed Practical Nurse-Certified Practice Act shall not prohibit the performance of the activities identified in section 38-1613 by an unlicensed person if performed (1) in an emergency situation, (2) by a legally qualified person from another state employed by the federal government and performing official duties in this state, or (3) by a person enrolled in an approved certification course if performed as part of that approved certification course.
